sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Grid, Paper, Typography } from '@mui/material';
import { styled } from '@mui/material/styles';

const Item = styled(Paper)(({ theme }) => ({
    backgroundColor: theme.palette.mode === 'dark' ? '#1A2027' : '#fff',
    ...theme.typography.body2,
    padding: theme.spacing(3),
    textAlign: 'center',
    color: theme.palette.text.secondary,
}));

const Dashboard = () => {
    return (
        <Grid container spacing={3}>
            <Grid item xs={12}>
                <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom>
                    儀表板
                </Typography>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
                <Item>
                    <Typography variant="h6">今日訂單</Typography>
                    <Typography variant="h3">12</Typography>
                </Item>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
                <Item>
                    <Typography variant="h6">本月營收</Typography>
                    <Typography variant="h3">$45,678</Typography>
                </Item>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
                <Item>
                    <Typography variant="h6">活躍客戶</Typography>
                    <Typography variant="h3">256</Typography>
                </Item>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
                <Item>
                    <Typography variant="h6">庫存產品</Typography>
                    <Typography variant="h3">189</Typography>
                </Item>
            </Grid>
        </Grid>
    );
};

export default Dashboard;
